akn:section.akn:heading: Committee on Care of Veterans with Traumatic Brain Injury

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary shall establish in the Veterans Health Administration a committee to be known as the “Committee on Care of Veterans with Traumatic Brain Injury”. The Under Secretary for Health shall appoint employees of the Department with expertise in the care of veterans with traumatic brain injury to serve on the committee.
